table.name: blast_db
table.remarks: This table holds metadata about the BLAST databases that we keep in stock.

column.name: file_base
column.remarks: the basename of the blast db files, relative to the root of the databases repository. A blast DB is usually composed of 3 files, all with a given basename, and with the extensions .[pn]in, .[pn]sq, and .[pn]hr.

column.name: index_seqs
column.remarks: corresponds to formatdb -o option. Set true if formatdb should be given a '-o T'. This is used only if you later want to fetch specific sequences out of this blast db.

column.name: blast_db_group_id
column.remarks: blast_db_group this belongs to, for displaying on web

column.name: web_interface_visible
column.remarks: whether this blast DB is available for BLASTing via web interfaces

table.name: chadoprop
table.remarks: This table is different from other prop tables in the database, as it is for storing information about the database itself, like schema version

column.name: type_id
column.remarks: The name of the property or slot is a cvterm. The meaning of the property is defined in that cvterm.

column.name: value
column.remarks: The value of the property, represented as text. Numeric values are converted to their text representation.

column.name: rank
column.remarks: Property-Value ordering. Any cv can have multiple values for any particular property type - these are ordered in a list using rank, counting from zero. For properties that are single-valued rather than multi-valued, the default 0 value should be used.

checkConstraint.constraint: (((rflp_experiment_id IS NOT NULL) OR (pcr_experiment_id IS NOT NULL) OR (location_id IS NOT NULL)))
checkConstraint.name: marker_experiment_check

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((pcr_experiment_id IS NOT NULL) AND (rflp_experiment_id IS NULL)) OR ((pcr_experiment_id IS NULL) AND (rflp_experiment_id IS NOT NULL)) OR ((pcr_experiment_id IS NULL) AND (rflp_experiment_id IS NULL) AND (location_id IS NOT NULL))))
checkConstraint.name: marker_experiment_check1

checkConstraint.constraint: (((protocol = 'AFLP'::text) OR (protocol = 'CAPS'::text) OR (protocol = 'RAPD'::text) OR (protocol = 'SNP'::text) OR (protocol = 'SSR'::text) OR (protocol = 'RFLP'::text) OR (protocol = 'PCR'::text) OR (protocol = 'dCAPS'::text) OR (protocol = 'DART'::text) OR (protocol = 'OPA'::text) OR (protocol = 'unknown'::text) OR (protocol = 'ASPE'::text) OR (protocol = 'INDEL'::text) OR (protocol = 'QTL'::text)))
checkConstraint.name: marker_experiment_protocol_check

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((protocol = 'RFLP'::text) AND (pcr_experiment_id IS NULL)) OR ((protocol <> 'RFLP'::text) AND (rflp_experiment_id IS NULL))))
checkConstraint.name: marker_experiment_rflp_protocol_consistency

table.name: marker_to_map
table.viewSql: SELECT m.marker_id, me.protocol, ml.location_id, linkage_group.lg_name, linkage_group.lg_order, ml."position", ml.confidence_id, ml.subscript, ml.map_version_id, map.map_id, map.parent_1, map.parent_2, map_version.current_version FROM (((((sgn.marker m LEFT JOIN sgn.marker_experiment me USING (marker_id)) LEFT JOIN sgn.marker_location ml USING (location_id)) LEFT JOIN sgn.map_version USING (map_version_id)) LEFT JOIN sgn.map USING (map_id)) LEFT JOIN sgn.linkage_group USING (lg_id)) WHERE (map_version.current_version = true);

checkConstraint.constraint: (((primer_id_fwd IS NULL) OR (primer_id_rev IS NULL) OR (NOT (primer_id_fwd = primer_id_rev))))
checkConstraint.name: different_primers

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((band_size IS NOT NULL) OR (multiple_flag IS NOT NULL)) AND (NOT ((band_size IS NOT NULL) AND (multiple_flag IS NOT NULL)))))
checkConstraint.name: band_size_or_multiple_check

checkConstraint.constraint: ((((nr_members > 1) AND (consensi_id IS NOT NULL)) OR ((nr_members = 1) AND (consensi_id IS NULL))))
checkConstraint.name: unigene_nr_members_iff_consensi_id

routine.name: connectby(text, text, text, text, integer, text)
connectby(text, text, text, text, text, integer)
connectby(text, text, text, text, text, integer, text)
pgp_armor_headers(text, OUT key text, OUT value text)
